recipesJson.name: Watermelon jelly rancher
recipesJson.author: Chrisdvr1
recipesJson.description: Pretty straightforward recipe here watermelon a touch of lemon Sicily to brighten it up jelly candy and super sweet to give you those sweet lips.

reviews.text: good watermelon candy mix off the shake. good shit my guy.

I made this about 9 months ago, and tried it as soon as I made it.  It was good, but nothing to go nuts over.  Just pulled it out from the back of the shelf, and I am definitely making another, much larger batch.

I made this for my wife, because she likes sweeter fruits. Only steeped 3 days now and OMG is it good, not sure she'll be getting any of it! You nailed this profile on the head, and about to mix up a bigger batch to see if I can make it through the full steep, thank you!

This is the highest I've ever found CAP Super Sweet to be enjoyable, but it is very enjoyable here, and I'll be damned if that doesn't taste just like a Jolly Rancher watermelon gummy. Excellent recipe!

LA watermelon really shines here.  First time using jelly candy and I like how it leaves your mouth a little sticky like the inside of a jelly bean.  I like this and don't know if this is gonna last 14 to steep out.....
As described, nice watermelon candy flavour, Cap SS is a little high but it works well to give it that sugary feel.
